title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP apologizes to Vanilla for comparing a Broncos/Colts matchup to it yesterday. The guys recap a tough Thursday Night Football Game. Todd and Paul go head to head in a Mock Headline-off. MLB Network's Kevin Millar tells us his pick for the World Series with the playoffs starting today. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
